title: Life As Theme Camp
author: John "Halcyon" Styn
content:
Burning Man is overflowing with lessons. One that Iâ€™m becoming increasingly aware of is that life is more awesome when you live as an ambassador from a Theme Camp.

Last week, during my Hug Nation broadcast, I discussed what Theme Camps are and how they have profoundly affected the way that I interact with the world.

Love,

Halcyon )'(
